column1: don't manage the nova uid/gid if nova_{user,"group}_id is undef
column3: any user modification before standard system package creates the
column4: user is wrong. usecase of patch adding the user is also broken as
column5: there are several other options: provide user before whole class
column6: nova"," have user id enforced by package or as most humans do accept
column7: that in multi host enviroments there are 3 layers - user"," group and
column8: netgroup. in all cases nova puppet module should never touch the
column9: user as it's provided by package on all supported systems"," but for
column10: backwards compatibility the management of user is disabled if
column11: nova_group_id is undef or if nova_user_id is undef.
